actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to develop a standby program of needed public works projects to be authorized by the Congress when determined necessary to stimulate the economy.

summary.text: Standby Public Works Program Act - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to develop a program of planned public works projects to provide substantial amounts of employment which can be authorized by Congress with a minimum of delay. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as necessary to develop such a program.

titles.title: A bill to develop a standby program of needed public works projects to be authorized by the Congress when determined necessary to stimulate the economy.
